entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers or drizzle beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
